pages.text: $(li)Over 70 rooms were revised.$(li)Some blocks have new textures by MrDenn.$(li)Portals to dungeons can now be built in any dimension.$(li)Fixed some rooms in which players could get stuck.$(li)Improved the functionality of the Bell of Secrets. (It now works.)

$(li)Various bugs relating to the worldborder have been fixed.$(li)New themed dungeons!$(li)Enemies will randomly carry keys to themed dungeons.$(li)Made the pickaxe the official tool for all blocks in this mod.
